016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.json;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.MissingNode;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
022
023import java.util.Iterator;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.function.BiFunction;
026
027/**
028 * Given a JSON tree, merge in another JSON tree into it and return the new tree.
029 * <p>
030 * Primitive values get overwritten by adding node, object values get current added with merged object,
031 * and arrays get merged elements added to original array
032 */
033public class JsonMerger
034        implements BiFunction<ObjectNode, ObjectNode, ObjectNode> {
035    @Override
036    public ObjectNode apply(ObjectNode current, ObjectNode adding) {
037        ObjectNode merged = current.deepCopy();
038        return merge(merged, adding);
039    }
040
041    public ObjectNode merge(ObjectNode current, ObjectNode adding) {
042        return merge0(current, adding, true);
043    }
044
045    public ObjectNode merge0(ObjectNode current, ObjectNode adding, boolean isRoot) {
046        Iterator<Map.Entry<String, JsonNode>> fields = adding.fields();
047        fields:
048        while (fields.hasNext()) {
049            JsonNode currentNode = current;
050            Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> entry = fields.next();
051
052            String key;
053            if (entry.getKey().startsWith(".")) {
054                key = entry.getKey().substring(1);
055            } else if (!isRoot) {
056                key = entry.getKey();
057            } else {
058                String[] keys = entry.getKey().split("\\.");
059                for (int i = 0; i < keys.length - 1; i++) {
060                    JsonNode nextNode = currentNode.path(keys[i]);
061                    if (nextNode.isMissingNode()) {
062                        nextNode = current.objectNode();
063                        ((ObjectNode) currentNode).set(keys[i], nextNode);
064                    }
065                    currentNode = nextNode;
066                }
067                key = keys[keys.length - 1];
068            }
069
070            if (!currentNode.isObject())
071                continue;
072
073            ObjectNode currentObject = (ObjectNode) currentNode;
074            setValue(currentObject, key, entry.getValue());
075        }
076        return current;
077    }
078
079    private void setValue(ObjectNode currentObject, String key, JsonNode value) {
080        if (value instanceof ObjectNode addingObject) {
081            JsonNode currentValue = currentObject.path(key);
082            if (currentValue instanceof MissingNode) {
083                currentObject.set(key, value);
084            } else if (currentValue instanceof ObjectNode currentValueObject) {
085                currentObject.set(key, merge0(currentValueObject, addingObject, false));
086            }
087        } else if (value instanceof ArrayNode addingarray) {
088            JsonNode currentValue = currentObject.path(key);
089            if (currentValue.isMissingNode()) {
090                currentObject.set(key, addingarray);
091            } else if (currentValue instanceof ArrayNode currentArray) {
092                addingarray.forEach(addingValue ->
093                {
094                    if (addingValue instanceof ObjectNode addingObject)
095                    {
096                        // Check if object with this identity exists in array
097                        boolean updatedObject = false;
098                        for (JsonNode jsonNode : currentArray) {
099                            if (jsonNode instanceof ObjectNode currentArrayObject)
100                            {
101                                // Merge it
102                                Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> currentIdField = currentArrayObject.fields().next();
103                                Map.Entry<String, JsonNode> addingIdField = addingObject.fields().next();
104                                if (currentIdField.getKey().equals(addingIdField.getKey()) && currentIdField.getValue().equals(addingIdField.getValue())) {
105                                    merge0(currentArrayObject, addingObject, false);
106                                    updatedObject = true;
107                                    break;
108                                }
109                            }
110                        }
111                        if (!updatedObject)
112                        {
113                            currentArray.add(addingValue);
114                        }
115                    } else
116                    {
117                        currentArray.add(addingValue);
118                    }
119                });
120            }
121        } else {
122            currentObject.set(key, value);
123        }
124    }
125}
